## **Description**
The **Contains **operator allows to verify if an input data contains the string defined in the configuration settings, and returns the position of its first occurrence.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

String

The input data in which you want to locate the string defined in the settings

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

Integer number

The position within the input string of the first occurrence of the substring defined in the settings

## **![](data:image/png;base64,)****Settings**
- *(optional) *Select the **Use regular expression **option if you want to use regular expressions in the search pattern.

- In the **Pattern **text field, type the string that you want to locate in the input data.

- Click **Apply **to confirm.

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**NULL input (no input)**

The operator returns the value ***0 ***if the input is NULL. The system logs a warning message.

**Input with NULL value**

The operator returns the value ***0 ***if the input has a NULL value. The system logs a warning message.
